title: Alan Wake vs. the best JRPG of the year [Resties]
description: In this, the first official episode of The Besties Resties: Alan Wake Remastered, Tales of Arise, and The Artful Escape are great games. And yet you may have missed them because there are so many new releases hitting all at once. Don't worry, we'll catch you up on the fall's OTHER great games. New episodes of The Besties Resties will drop on every other Tuesday through the rest of 2021.
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (Russ Frushtick, Chris Plante)
